item1: Products treat variety conditions affecting spine, including degenerative disc disease, spinal deformity, spinal tumors, fractures spine, stenosis. These products include CATALYFT PL expandable interbody spacers, CD Horizon ModuLeX spinal system, T2 STRATOSPHERE expandable corpectomy system. These products can also include titanium interbody implants surface technologies, such Adaptix interbody system incorporated Titan interbody fusion device nanoLOCK technology. Products facilitate less invasive thoracolumbar surgeries, including CD Horizon Solera Voyager percutaneous fixation system various retractor systems access spine through smaller incisions.
